## My first map with Leaflet
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()
my_map
```

## Add markers
```{r}
home <- c(52.26328566358967, 6.170381275769941)
my_map <- my_map %>%
  addMarkers(lat = home[1], lng = home[2],
             popup = "Paul's home")
my_map
```

## Add multiple markers
```{r}
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(20, min=home[1] - 0.1, max=home[1] + 0.1),
                 lng = runif(20, min=home[2] - 0.1, max=home[2] + 0.1))
df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(popup = paste(home[1], home[2]))
```
